abstract: British electronic musician Matthew Herbert's new album One Pig tracks life of single pig from its birth on farm to its slaughter 25 weeks later, using sounds from pig's environment; album has drawn criticism from People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals.
snippet: On “One Pig,” Matthew Herbert, an electronic musician obsessed with the possibilities of using found sounds, tracks a single swine’s life from its birth on a farm to its slaughter 25 weeks later.
